frameset.edef: to finalize or complete,to master, to have command on

example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS أحكم) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC اقفال) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المدارس))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_ACC المرتفعات)))) (PUNC ,)

arg.g: the schools' closure in the mountains
